userswatchlistanontext: Please log in to view or edit items on your watchlist.
userswatchlistedit-normal-explain:
Users on your watchlist are shown below.
To remove a user, check the box next to it, and click "{{int:userswatchlistedit-normal-submit}}".
You can also [[Special:EditUsersWatchlist/raw|edit the raw list]].
userswatchlistedit-raw-explain:
Users on your users watchlist are shown below, and can be edited by adding to and removing from the list;
one title per line.
When finished, click "{{int:userswatchlistedit-raw-submit}}".
You can also [[Special:EditUsersWatchlist|use the standard editor]].
userswatchlistedit-raw-done: Your users watchlist has been updated.
userswatchlistedit-raw-failed: {{PLURAL:$1|1 user can't|$1 users can't}} be added:
userswatchlistedit-clear-explain: All of the users will be removed from your users watch list
userswatchlistedit-clear-submit: Clear the users watchlist (This is permanent!)
userswatchlistedit-clear-done: Your users watchlist has been cleared.
userswatchlistedit-too-many: There are too many pages to display here.
tog-userswatchlist-allow: Allow other users to add me to their users watchlist
